specialMessages.title: Welcome to Darius Pizza!
specialMessages.message: We're excited to serve you authentic Italian pizza made with love and tradition.

specialMessages.title: Free Delivery Available
specialMessages.message: Enjoy free delivery on orders over $25 within 5 miles of our location.

specialMessages.title: New Menu Items
specialMessages.message: Check out our latest additions including the Truffle Margherita and Spicy Diavola pizzas!

specialMessages.title: Today's Special: Margherita Monday!
specialMessages.message: Get 20% off our classic Margherita pizza every Monday. Made with fresh mozzarella, San Marzano tomatoes, and basil.

specialMessages.title: Kitchen Update
specialMessages.message: Our wood-fired oven is being serviced today. Some specialty pizzas may take 5-10 minutes longer than usual.
